product_detail_review_tanu_text: He loved seeing himself in the story. It's playful, smart, and super engaging.
product_detail_review_nivedita_text: Every page feels like a new adventure, and he's so proud when he spots his name. It's made learning letters something he actually looks forward to.
product_detail_review_avinash_text: Each letter felt like a new mission for him. It's fun, colorful, and makes learning feel like an adventure made just for him.
product_detail_review_aditya_text: Perfect mix of fun and learning. It's boosted his confidence and made letters exciting.
product_detail_faq_shipping_question: Do you ship to my location?
product_detail_faq_shipping_answer: Yes! We offer worldwide shipping, so no matter where you are, we'll make sure your personalized storybook reaches you safely.
product_detail_faq_shipping_time_answer: Shipping times vary by location. Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days within the US, and 10-15 business days for international orders.
product_detail_faq_order_question: How do I place an order?
product_detail_faq_order_answer: Simply select your book, customize it with your child's details, add it to cart, and proceed to checkout. We'll guide you through each step!
product_detail_faq_satisfaction_question: What if I'm not happy with my order?
product_detail_faq_satisfaction_answer: We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, contact us within 30 days and we'll make it right.
product_detail_faq_refund_question: Can I get a refund for my order?
product_detail_faq_refund_answer: Yes, we offer full refunds within 30 days of delivery if you're not satisfied with your purchase. The book must be returned in its original condition.
product_detail_faq_languages_question: What languages are your books available in?
product_detail_faq_languages_answer: Our books are currently available in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, and Portuguese. We're constantly adding new languages!

home_page_bring_character: To bring your character to life!
home_page_magical_adventures: From magical adventures for little dreamers to heartwarming reads for Mum, Dad, and even Grandma, there's a little something for everyone.
home_page_bring_imagination: Bring your child's imagination to life!
home_page_hero_adventure: Make them the hero of their own magical adventure with a hyper-personalised storybook!
home_page_review_sarah_text: Absolutely love these personalized storybooks! My daughter was thrilled to see herself as the main character. The quality is outstanding and the stories are engaging and educational.
home_page_review_michael_text: Best gift ever! Bought this for my nephew's birthday and he hasn't put it down since. The illustrations are beautiful and the personalization makes it so special.
home_page_review_emma_text: Great concept and my kids enjoy reading their personalized books every night. The stories are well-written and age-appropriate. Highly recommend for any parent!
home_page_review_james_text: These books have made reading fun for my son who was reluctant before. Seeing himself in the story has sparked his imagination and love for reading.
home_page_review_olivia_text: Wonderful quality and fast delivery! The personalized touch makes these books unique. My daughter reads her book over and over again. Worth every penny!
home_page_review_david_text: Exceptional service and product! Bought several books for my kids and they absolutely adore them. The stories teach valuable lessons while keeping them entertained.

that make every child the hero of their

privacy_policy_introduction_text: Welcome to Hero Kids! We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our personalized children's book creation service.
privacy_policy_personal_info_text:
When you create an account or personalize a book, we may collect:
• Name and email address
• Child's name and age for book personalization
• Billing and shipping information for purchases
• Profile picture or character customization data
privacy_policy_usage_info_text:
We automatically collect certain information when you use our service:
• Device information (type, operating system)
• IP address and location data
• Browser type and version
• Pages visited and time spent on our platform
• Preferences and settings
privacy_policy_cookies_text: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage patterns, and personalize content. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy_policy_how_use_text:
We use the collected information to:
• Create and personalize books for children
• Process orders and deliver products
• Improve our services and user experience
• Send important updates and promotional materials (with your consent)
• Provide customer support
• Prevent fraud and ensure platform security
• Comply with legal obligations
privacy_policy_sharing_text:
We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with:
• Service providers (payment processors, shipping partners, printing services)
• Legal authorities when required by law
• Business partners with your explicit consent

All third parties are required to maintain the confidentiality and security of your information.
privacy_policy_children_text: Hero Kids is designed for parents and guardians to create personalized books for children. We do not knowingly collect personal information directly from children under 13. Parents and guardians are responsible for providing any child-related information for book personalization.
privacy_policy_security_text:
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including:
• Encryption of sensitive data
• Secure server infrastructure
• Regular security audits
• Access controls and authentication

While we strive to protect your data, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy_policy_rights_text:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal information
• Correct inaccurate data
• Request deletion of your account and data
• Opt-out of marketing communications
• Withdraw consent at any time
• Export your data

To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@herokids.com
privacy_policy_retention_text: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal information within 30 days, except where we are required to retain it by law.
privacy_policy_international_text: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy_changes_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of our service after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy_policy_contact_text: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
privacy_policy_contact_address:
Address: Hero Kids Inc.
123 Story Lane, Suite 100
New York, NY 10001
customer_support_subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.
customer_support_faq_how_long: How long does it take to create a personalized book?
customer_support_faq_how_long_answer: Once you complete the personalization process, your book will be generated within 24-48 hours. You'll receive an email notification when it's ready.
customer_support_faq_edit: Can I edit my book after ordering?
customer_support_faq_edit_answer: You can edit your book before finalizing the order. Once an order is placed and payment is processed, changes cannot be made. However, you can create a new version.
customer_support_faq_age_groups: What age groups are the books suitable for?
customer_support_faq_age_groups_answer: Our books are designed for children aged 3-12 years. You can filter books by age category to find the perfect story for your child.
customer_support_faq_track_order: How do I track my order?
customer_support_faq_track_order_answer: After placing an order, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also check your order status in the "My Orders" section of your account.
customer_support_faq_refund_answer: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with your book, contact us for a full refund or replacement.
customer_support_form_subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
customer_support_message_min_length: Message must be at least 10 characters
customer_support_success_message: Thank you! Your message has been sent. We'll get back to you soon.
thank_you_page_success_message: Your order has been placed successfully
